channel.title: Check out Next.co! Promote Your Tracks!
channel.description:
Hey Auxy users! We established Next.recs in 2016 with the goal of sharing unheard artists with the world and we would love to showcase and promote some of the best Auxy talent on our channels along with our other artists!
Usually we release just tracks on our YouTube channel and SoundCloud pages, but we have also just started a free repost service if thats more your thing ;)
Check us out here -> https://soundcloud.com/nextrecs-co
PM us on SoundCloud or drop a link below if your interested in submiting tracks :grin:
Click here to find our repost page -> https://soundcloud.com/next-repost YouTube -> https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCItgDLUQzCwx6aA2BeGUCFA

item.title: Check out Next.co! Promote Your Tracks!
item.dc:creator: Next.co
item.description:
Yeah true you can‚Äôt be too careful with this. Usually we talk with anybody that we are promoting first before uploading YouTube etc. Ultimately, we want you to be comfortable about letting us promote your track and we won‚Äôt infringe any of your rights as an artist. Might be worth having a look at some of the music on our channels (look at some of the newer stuff) to see how we do things

This one is a pretty good > https://soundcloud.com/nextrecs-co/nr031

Hope this clears anything up

Read full topic
item.source: Check out Next.co! Promote Your Tracks!
